title: John Fabian Witt, "American Contagions: Epidemics and the Law from Smallpox to COVID-19"
description:
Law professor John Fabian Witt examines the relationship between law, epidemics, and public health guidelines. He’s interviewed by Georgetown University law professor and director of the Institute for National & Global Health Law Lawrence Gostin.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
